select t1.reply_id as replyId, t2.portrait as portrait, t1.reply_user_id as replyUserId, t2.nickname as nickname, t1.reply_time as replyTime, t1.reply_to_user_id as replyToUserId, t3.nickname as replyToNickname, t1.comment_id as commentId, t1.reply_content as replyContent, 'false' as inputShow from m_reply t1 left join m_user t2 on t2.id=t1.reply_user_id left join m_user t3 on t3.id = t1.reply_to_user_id where 1=1
and comment_id = #{commentId}
